sentences.sContent: One thinks of Amos the sheepherder, Socrates the stonemason, Omar the tentmaker .
sentences.sContent_eng: One thinks of Amos the sheepherder, Socrates the stonemason, Omar the tentmaker .
sentences.sCn: 想想牧羊人阿摩司，石匠苏格拉底，帐蓬制造人奥马尔。

sentences.sContent: The son of a stonemason, born around 469BC, Socrates was famously odd.
sentences.sContent_eng: The son of a stonemason, born around 469BC, Socrates was famously odd.
sentences.sCn: 他是一名石像雕刻师的儿子，大约出生于公元前469年，苏格拉底因他的古怪而出名。

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is cutting stone into pieces to be used in buildings
